item.title: Annoying thing
item.dc:creator: @Chrisface Chrisface
item.description:
@Chrisface wrote:

[quote=“traitors, post:3, topic:3548”]i need to state if true then but it already returns true so wtf?

also how do i get this to work im doing something wrong (it runs just clicks random spot)

procedure Pmine; begin if FindColorEllipse(x,y,ore1,1,252,155,309,228)then; wait(1000+random(500)); Clickmouse(x,y,true);[/quote]

This won’te work because it should like this

procedure Pmine;
begin
  if FindColorEllipse(x,y,ore1,1,252,155,309,228)then
    begin
      wait(1000+random(500));
      Clickmouse(x,y,true);  
    end;
end;

You put a semi-colon after the “then” which you shouldnt do. Also when you do an if statement you MUST have a begin as well as an end for the code you want it to do. the only exception to this if the code you want it to do is only one line long and you don’t need the begin or end in the case.

Read full topic
